MENU_ITEMS.title: GO BACK
MENU_ITEMS.description: Return to the main menu. Press ENTER.

MENU_ITEMS.title: DISPLAY FPS
MENU_ITEMS.description: Display the current screen refresh rate in frames per second, in the format 'True'/'False'. Current value: '{}'.

MENU_ITEMS.title: TEXT COLOUR
MENU_ITEMS.description: Set the colour of the displayed text, in the format 'RRGGBB' Current value: '{}'.

MENU_ITEMS.title: BACKGROUND COLOUR
MENU_ITEMS.description: Set the colour of the background, in the format 'RRGGBB' Current value: '{}'.

MENU_ITEMS.title: FONT SIZE
MENU_ITEMS.description: Set the font size of the text. Current value: '{}'
